title: Drawing, "Studies of a male nude", 1650–75
medium: Black and white crayon, on rough gray paper
markings: Watermark: two bells in a circle
inscribed:
Upper left corner: No. 646
Lower left corner: Carlo Maratti
A previous attribution has been erased.
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description:
(A) Profile of a man walking towards right, his left arm raised, right arm lowered, a nimbus glowing above his head.
(B) Reverse: right leg of a seated man, part of a left arm, front view of left foot, profile view of right foot, part of drapery.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Studies of a male nude", 1650–75.
1650–75. Black and white crayon, on rough gray paper. Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-1809.
